fields.label: Property Id
fields.name: property_id
fields.instructions: ID of property in Departure Finder

fields.label: Destinations
fields.name: destinations
fields.instructions: Include all that apply

fields.label: Locations
fields.name: locations
fields.instructions: Include all that apply (Location - Parent Destination)

fields.label: Activities
fields.name: activities
fields.instructions: Include all that apply

fields.label: Show Notification
fields.name: show_notification
fields.instructions: Check to display a notification message on page load

fields.label: Search Rank
fields.name: search_rank
fields.instructions: Weight given to search priority, from 1-1000. A higher number will appear first in search results. A product with a weight of 1 will appear last. Score average products: ~500 range, products to appear first: 700+ range, products to rank last: sub 300 range.

fields.label: Top Snippet
fields.name: top_snippet
fields.instructions: To appear in result item cards, and as the sub-text to the product page title

fields.label: Vessel Capacity
fields.name: vessel_capacity
fields.instructions: Total number of guests

fields.label: Hero Image
fields.name: hero_image
fields.instructions: Hero image for cruise (1920 x 730). Boat should be in left side of image, ideally an angled profile.

fields.label: Featured Image
fields.name: featured_image
fields.instructions: Featured Image in cards, search results, etc (750 x 500). Left facing boat if possible

fields.label: Highlight Gallery
fields.name: highlight_gallery
fields.instructions: Add images to the highlights slider at the top (750 x 750)

fields.label: Areas Gallery
fields.name: areas_gallery
fields.instructions: Images for the areas of the ship (750x500)

fields.label: Reviews Background
fields.name: reviews_background
fields.instructions: 1920 x 730 min (Parallax background image behind testimonials)

fields.label: Highlights
fields.name: highlights
fields.instructions: Enter ship highlights

sub_fields.label: Dry Bags/Plastic bags to protect cameras
sub_fields.name: dry_bags

fields.label: Display Special Note
fields.name: display_special_note
fields.instructions: If checked, will display a special note box under the price groups. Use this area to specify special instructions about prices or additional add-on services)
fields.message: Select True to display special note on pricing page

sub_fields.label: Display Yearly
sub_fields.name: display_yearly
sub_fields.instructions: Check this to display 3 column policy, overall, current year, and next year. Unchecked (default) is 1 column, overall policy.

fields.label: Charter Available
fields.name: charter_available
fields.instructions: Check if this vessel can be chartered

fields.label: Charter Header Text Override
fields.name: charter_header_text_override
fields.instructions: 50 character limit. If not blank, will replace the default text of "Exclusive, private cruise based on full occupancy"

fields.label: Charter Daily Price (deprecated)
fields.name: charter_daily_price
fields.instructions: Price per day to charter the vessel

fields.label: Charter Min Days
fields.name: charter_min_days
fields.instructions: Minimum number of days vessel must be chartered

fields.label: Charter Only
fields.name: charter_only
fields.instructions: Check if this vessel can ONLY be chartered -- NOTE: Itineraries will not display in Charter Only vessels unless the 'Is Sample' box is checked in DF.

fields.label: Charter Snippet
fields.name: charter_snippet
fields.instructions: Text that will display as default for all itineraries. To override individual itinerary text in charter view, edit the content in DF.
